p: Up to 80% of patients were concerned about their disease symptoms, to the point of extreme suspicion and doubt. Patients were worried that they would not recover or that their disease would worsen if symptoms progressed. P8: "I feel scared when I have two coughs. What if it becomes more severe?" Patients would frequently call the doctor or nurse when in discomfort and experienced nervousness, even regarding symptoms unrelated to COVID-19. P3: "Although knowing that my body temperature is not high, I repeatedly measure it. When I feel a little pain in my lower back I wonder whether it has worsened."
